DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine whether finding Shuhaiber et al . [ 2013 ] ( see citation ) may confirm use national audit data United Kingdom . A cohort acute ascend aortic dissection repair surgery extract National Adult Cardiac Surgery Audit ( NACSA ) database . The current dataset version 4.12 , available download website National Institute Cardiovascular Outcomes Research ( see link ) , contain 168 field detail pre-operative patient characteristic , operative detail post-operative outcome . The dataset revise intermittently meet requirement user respond change management adult cardiac surgery ; however , field analyse study subject document revision .
